problem.title: CheckPoint: Ranking Moments of Inertia
problem.p: Several objects, numbered 1-4, are made of small massive balls attached to light rigid rods. The masses of the balls and the lengths of the rods are shown in the diagram. Rank the rotational inertia of the objects with respect to the axis passing through the midpoint of each rod as shown.

customresponse.answer:
correct_answer = [ {'draggables': ['4'],'targets': ['item1'],'rule':'unordered_equal'}, {'draggables': ['2'],'targets': ['item2'],'rule':'unordered_equal'}, {'draggables': ['1'],'targets': ['item3'],'rule':'unordered_equal'}, {'draggables': ['3'],'targets': ['item4'],'rule':'unordered_equal'}, {'draggables': ['eq'],'targets': ['sign3'],'rule':'unordered_equal'}, {'draggables': ['gt'],'targets': ['sign1','sign2'],'rule':'unordered_equal'}]
if draganddrop.grade(submission[0], correct_answer): correct = ['correct'] else: correct = ['incorrect']
